description.@en: As the story of Sodom and Gomorrah, you are the Hellfurnaceâ€™s wrath. Radiant light falls over those who behold your fell countenance.

criticalFailure.@en: You have hell to pay to the Hellfurnace. You must succeed at a Resolve Test or else suffer from a random, but permanent Malignancy.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but those who Resist are also Defenseless.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, foes who look at you or make you the target of an Attack Action or Perilous Stunt must Resist with a successful Scrutinize Test or be turned to a pillar of salt, instantly Slain!. Those who Resist suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] Damage from fire. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but foes are always On Fire instead.

reagents.@en: The desiccated remains of a body left to dehydrate, held in a sack
